name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-samples-msgext-search-sso-config-nodejs
title: Messaging Extension SSO Config Bot
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates a Node.js Messaging Extension for Microsoft Teams that includes a configuration page and supports single sign-on (SSO) authentication for enhanced user experience.
longDescription: This Node.js sample showcases a Messaging Extension in Microsoft Teams, featuring a configuration page that allows users to authenticate via SSO. It enables users to perform searches and interact with external services directly within Teams, enhancing productivity and integration.

thumbnails.alt: Search driven messaging extension in Teams

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
